title: Fracking uses pressure to crack rock release gas

content.question: Hydraulic fracturing, or fracking, is the pumping of highly pressurized water with a mixture of sand and chemicals into boreholes to

choices.label: create cracks within the rock in order to provide pathways for the release of gas and oil
pulverize the rock in order to let gas and oil rise through the soil horizons
reopen old mine shafts, from which gas and oil can be collected
create seismic movement and artificial earthquakes in order to liberate gas and oil
supersaturate the rock with the fracking fluid, which scrubs gas and oil from the rock by abrasion

content.answer: create cracks within the rock in order to provide pathways for the release of gas and oil
